org.ligoj.app.dao

Interface ProjectRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Project,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Project,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Project,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Project>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Project,java.lang.Integer>, org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<Project,java.lang.Integer>

    public interface ProjectRepository
extends org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<Project,java.lang.Integer>
    Project repository

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String MY_PROJECTS
      Visible projects condition where the current user is either team leader, either member of one of the groups of this project.
      static java.lang.String VISIBLE_PROJECTS
      Visible projects condition, using ID subscription and team leader attribute.

      Return all Project objects with the given name.The other constraints are : The current user is the team leader Or, the current user is member of the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription Or, the current user is see the the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription and DelegateOrg

    • Method Detail

      • findAllLight

        @Query(value="SELECT p, COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) FROM Project AS p LEFT JOIN p.subscriptions AS s LEFT JOIN p.cacheGroups AS cpg LEFT JOIN cpg.group AS cg WHERE ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR visibleproject(p, cg.description, :user, :user, :user, :user, :user) = true) AND (UPPER(p.name) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(\'%\',:criteria),\'%\'))       OR UPPER(p.description) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(\'%\',:criteria),\'%\'))) GROUP BY p",
       countQuery="SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p) FROM Project AS p LEFT JOIN p.cacheGroups AS cpg LEFT JOIN cpg.group AS cg WHERE ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR visibleproject(p, cg.description, :user, :user, :user, :user, :user) = true) AND (UPPER(p.name) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(\'%\',:criteria),\'%\'))       OR UPPER(p.description) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(\'%\',:criteria),\'%\'))) GROUP BY p")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page<java.lang.Object[]> findAllLight(java.lang.String user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String criteria,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable page)
        Return all Project objects with the given name.The other constraints are :
        • The current user is the team leader
        • Or, the current user is member of the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription
        • Or, the current user is see the the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription and DelegateOrg
        Parameters:
        user - The current user name
        criteria - the optional criteria to match.
        page - the pagination.
        Returns:
        all Project objects with the given name. Insensitive case search is used.

      • findAllHavingSubscription

        @Query(value="SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.name, p.pkey FROM Project AS p LEFT JOIN p.cacheGroups AS cpg LEFT JOIN cpg.group AS cg WHERE ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR visibleproject(p, cg.description, :user, :user, :user, :user, :user) = true) AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM Subscription AS s WHERE s.project=p)")
java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> findAllHavingSubscription(java.lang.String user)
        Return all Project objects having at least one subscription and with light information. The visibility is checked :
        • The current user is the team leader
        • Or, the current user is member of the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription
        • Or, the current user is see the the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription and DelegateOrg
        Parameters:
        user - The current user name
        Returns:
        all visible Project objects for the given user.

      • findOneVisible

        @Query(value="SELECT DISTINCT p FROM Project AS p LEFT JOIN FETCH p.subscriptions AS s LEFT JOIN p.cacheGroups AS cpg LEFT JOIN cpg.group AS cg WHERE p.id = :id AND ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR visibleproject(p, cg.description, :user, :user, :user, :user, :user) = true)")
Project findOneVisible(int id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String user)
        Return a project by its identifier. The other constraints are :
        • The current user is the team leader
        • Or, the current user is member of the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription
        • Or, the current user is see the the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription and DelegateOrg
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier to match.
        user - The current user name.
        Returns:
        the project or null if not found or not visible.

      • findByPKey

        @Query(value="SELECT DISTINCT p FROM Project AS p LEFT JOIN p.cacheGroups AS cpg LEFT JOIN cpg.group AS cg WHERE p.pkey = :pkey AND ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR visibleproject(p, cg.description, :user, :user, :user, :user, :user) = true)")
Project findByPKey(java.lang.String pkey,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String user)
        Return a project by its pkey. The other constraints are :
        • The current user is the team leader
        • Or, the current user is member of the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription
        • Or, the current user is see the the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription and DelegateOrg
        Parameters:
        pkey - the pkey to match.
        user - The current user name.
        Returns:
        the project or null if not found or not visible.

      • isManageSubscription

        @Query(value="SELECT p.id FROM Project AS p WHERE p.id = :project AND (p.teamLeader = :user OR (EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ParameterValue AS pv, CacheGroup g WHERE      pv.parameter.id = \'service:id:group\' AND pv.subscription.project = p AND g.id = pv.data  AND (EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM DelegateOrg d WHERE ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description))))))   AND d.canAdmin=true AND ((d.type=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.DelegateType.GROUP AND d.dn=g.description) OR    (d.type=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.DelegateType.TREE AND (g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',d.dn) OR d.dn=g.description)))))))")
java.lang.Integer isManageSubscription(int project,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String user)
        Indicate the current user can manage the subscriptions of the given project. The other constraints are :
        • The current user is the team leader
        • Or, the current user is an administrator
        • Or, the current user manages the group associated to this project via the service:id subscription and DelegateOrg
        Parameters:
        user - The current user name.
        project - The project's identifier to match.
        Returns:
        Non null project's identifier if the user can manage the subscriptions of this project.
        See Also:
        org.ligoj.app.iam.model.AbstractDelegate#isCanAdmin()
